description: This resource contains information about coral ecoregions in the Western Indian Ocean, which were assessed for their threat status. It includes a summary of vulnerability scores for each ecoregion based on four RLE criteria. The resource also displays an overall score for all ecoregions. For more details, see https://www.nature.com/articles/s41893-021-00817-0
name: Red List (ecoregions) of  Western Indian Ocean Corals
